supplyDemandQuery.title: Final energy by detailed end-use sector and fuel
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and ((@name='building' or @name='industry' or @name='transportation') or (exists(child::keyword/@final-energy)))]//*[@type='input' and not(contains(@name, 'trn') or @name='limestone' or @name='process heat cement' or @name='industrial energy use' or @name='industrial feedstocks' or @name='renewable' or @name='oil-credits')]/demand-physical[@unit='EJ']/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: water consumption by state, sector, basin (includes desal)
water withdrawals by state, sector, basin (includes desal)
elec gen by gen tech and cooling tech and vintage
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld' or contains(@name,'elec_')) and not(contains(@name, 'water_td'))]/ *[@type='subsector' and not (@name='elect_td_bld')]/ *[@type='technology' and not(@name='biomass (conv)' or @name='biomass (conv CCS)' or @name='biomass (IGCC)' or @name='biomass (IGCC CCS)' or @name='coal (conv pul)' or @name='coal (conv pul CCS)' or @name='coal (IGCC)' or @name='coal (IGCC CCS)' or @name='gas (steam/CT)' or @name='gas (CC)' or @name='gas (CC CCS)' or @name='refined liquids (steam/CT)' or @name='refined liquids (CC)' or @name='refined liquids (CC CCS)' or @name='geothermal' or @name='Gen_II_LWR' or @name='Gen_III' or @name='CSP' or @name='CSP_storage')]/ *[@type='output' (:collapse:)]/physical-output/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: elec gen by gen tech USA
elec gen by gen tech cogen USA
elec gen by gen tech and cooling tech
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='electricity' or @name='elect_td_bld' or contains(@name,'elec_')) and not(contains(@name, 'water_td'))]/ *[@type='subsector' and not (@name='elect_td_bld')]/ *[@type='technology' and not(@name='biomass (conv)' or @name='biomass (conv CCS)' or @name='biomass (IGCC)' or @name='biomass (IGCC CCS)' or @name='coal (conv pul)' or @name='coal (conv pul CCS)' or @name='coal (IGCC)' or @name='coal (IGCC CCS)' or @name='gas (steam/CT)' or @name='gas (CC)' or @name='gas (CC CCS)' or @name='refined liquids (steam/CT)' or @name='refined liquids (CC)' or @name='refined liquids (CC CCS)' or @name='geothermal' or @name='Gen_II_LWR' or @name='Gen_III' or @name='CSP' or @name='CSP_storage')]/ *[@type='output']/physical-output/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: total final energy by aggregate sector
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and ((@name='building' or @name='industry' or @name='transportation') or (exists(child::keyword/@final-energy)))]//*[@type='input' (:collapse:) and not(@name='limestone' or @name='process heat cement' or @name='industrial energy use' or @name='industrial feedstocks' or @name='renewable' or contains(@name, 'trn') or @name='oil-credits')]/ demand-physical[@unit='EJ']/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: CO2 emissions by sector (no bio)

emissionsQueryBuilder.title: nonCO2 emissions by sector USA nonUS
nonCO2 emissions by sector USA nonUS
nonCO2 emissions by sector USA nonUS
nonCO2 emissions by sector USA nonUS

supplyDemandQuery.title: elec gen by gen tech and cooling tech (incl cogen)
test
elec coeff
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='base load generation' or @name='intermediate generation' or @name='subpeak generation' or @name='peak generation' or @name='electricity')]//IO-coefficient/node()

supplyDemandQuery.title: elec operating costs by tech and vintage
elec investment capacity factor
supplyDemandQuery.xPath: *[@type='sector' and (@name='baseload electricity' or @name='intermediate electricity' or @name='subpeak electricity' or @name='peak electricity')]//capacity-factor/node()
